AboutMeText.profession: Software developer by work (and yes, by passion too).
AboutMeText.myAreas: I very much rather deal with the back-end of things, but I'm starting to include front-end development in my skills (the "starting" part is this site).
AboutMeText.myLanguages: Although Spanish is my mother language, some people seem to think I can speak english too...
AboutMeText.findMyProjects: On this site you'll find some documentation and manuals for my NuGet packages. At this point it's just a copy of the instructions on the packages themselves. In the future, I'll be adding more details to it.

LandingDescriptions.Big Excel Creator: Create Excel files using OpenXML SAX with styling. This is specially useful when trying to output thousands of rows
LandingDescriptions.Snowflake Id Generator: Generate unique identifiers based on Twitter's Snowflake ID. Parse a Snowflake to get information about it's creation
